scripts.format:oas_generator: cd oas_generator && uv run ruff format
scripts.lint:oas_generator: cd oas_generator && uv run ruff check && uv run mypy rust_oas_generator
scripts.generate:algod_api: cd oas_generator && uv run python -m rust_oas_generator.cli ../specs/algod.oas3.json --output ../../crates/algod_client/ --package-name algod_client && npm run format:algod_client
